Welcome to ICJIA Accessibility Portal

The ICJIA Accessibility Status Portal is a comprehensive web accessibility tracking system designed to monitor progress toward April 2026 compliance goals across all ICJIA web properties.

What is This?â€‹

This portal provides:

  • ğŸ“Š Real-time accessibility scores for all monitored websites
  • ğŸ“ˆ Historical trend analysis showing improvement over time
  • ğŸ” Secure admin interface for managing sites and users
  • ğŸ”Œ API-only data ingestion for programmatic updates
  • ğŸ“‹ Complete audit trail of all changes and imports
  • ğŸŒ™ Dark mode interface optimized for accessibility

Key Featuresâ€‹

Public Dashboardâ€‹

View real-time accessibility scores for all monitored websites with interactive charts and detailed site information.

Detailed Site Viewsâ€‹

Interactive charts showing historical score progression with Axe and Lighthouse accessibility metrics.

Score Improvement Graphsâ€‹

Visual trend charts for both Axe and Lighthouse scores showing site-by-site improvements over time.

Multi-Format Exportsâ€‹

Export data in JSON, CSV, and Markdown formats for reporting and analysis.

Secure Admin Interfaceâ€‹

Protected authentication system with 15-day persistent sessions and role-based access control.

API-Only Data Ingestionâ€‹

Secure REST API for programmatic data uploads with API key authentication.

Activity Logâ€‹

Track all significant events including site creation, updates, and API imports.

Quick Navigationâ€‹

  • Quick Start - Get up and running in 5 minutes
  • Setup Guide - Complete setup walkthrough
  • Authentication - How the auth system works
  • Reset Scripts - Database reset utilities
  • API Documentation - API reference
  • Deployment - Production deployment guide

Technology Stackâ€‹

  • Frontend: React 18, TypeScript, Vite, Tailwind CSS
  • Backend: Express, Node.js, TypeScript
  • Database: Supabase (PostgreSQL)
  • Authentication: Cookie-based sessions with bcrypt hashing

Getting Helpâ€‹

  • ğŸ“– Check the Troubleshooting section
  • ğŸ› Report issues on GitHub
  • ğŸ’¬ Visit the ICJIA Website
